member.name: M:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.TypeHelper.IsCompilerGeneratedType(System.Type)
member.summary:
Checks to see if a given type is compiler generated.
The compiler will annotate either the target type or the declaring type with the CompilerGenerated attribute. We walk up the declaring types until we find a CompilerGenerated attribute or declare the type as not compiler generated otherwise.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.TypeHelper.IsCompilerGeneratedMethod(System.Reflection.MethodInfo)
member.summary: Checks to see if a given method is compiler generated.
